content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go

drop view if EXISTS bronze.view_rate_code go
create view bronze.view_rate_code
as 
select rate_code_id,rate_code from 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'logical_DWH_exDS',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )with(
        jasonresultread NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    as json_result_set
    CROSS APPLY openjson(jasonresultread) with(
        rate_code_id SMALLINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(30)
    )go

select * from bronze.view_rate_code go
